thread.title: venier custom motorcycles giappone vintage race bike
thread.title_full: venier custom motorcycles giappone vintage race bike

title: venier custom motorcycles giappone vintage race bike
text:
video courtesy of stefano venier 


even more, the back frame has been altered to fit a handmade fender and seat where underneath hides the small lithium battery and the M-Unit from moto gadget . the latter is also included in the handle bar for lights and grips — while the tail section has a hidden brake and switch lights. given how the giappone bike is capable of high power, brakes and suspensions have been greatly improved. 
right side – white tank and dark leather seat highlight the bike’s timeless quality 
the back frame has been altered to fit a handmade fender and seat 
front view – handle bars have been improved to accommodate the high-powered giappono 
back view – the tail section has a hidden brake and switch lights 
the donor bike is originally a kawasaki KZ 1000 LTD from 1984 
left side – black matte fairing, frame and wheels 
gold venier logo 
a small lithium battery and M-Unit from moto gadget hide underneath the seat 


designboom has received this project from our ‘ DIY submissions ‘ feature, where we welcome our readers to submit their own work for publication. see more project submissions from our readers here. 

edited by: lea zeitoun | designboom stefano venier
